up.profile_nickname as "userProfile.nickname", up.image_filename as "userProfile.filename", up.is_default as "userProfile.isDefault", up.is_default as "userProfile.isUrl" FROM user_party_application upa INNER JOIN user_profile up ON upa.profile_no = up.profile_no WHERE upa.application_no = #{value}
